typeDescription.name: BasicAnnot
typeDescription.description: Basic type that records the name of a component that produces the annotation and confidence score assigned to the annotation.

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: Confidence score assigned to the annotation.

featureDescription.name: annotatorName
featureDescription.description: The name of a component that produces the annotation.

typeDescription.name: Sentence
typeDescription.description: Inherit BasicAnnot to locate a sentence annotation.

typeDescription.name: Question
typeDescription.description: Inherit Sentence to locate a question annotation.

typeDescription.name: Answer
typeDescription.description: Inherit Sentence to locate a answer annotation.

featureDescription.name: isCorrect
featureDescription.description: Indicates if the answer is correct.

typeDescription.name: Token
typeDescription.description: Inherit BasicAnnot to locate and record a token after tokenization.

typeDescription.name: NGram
typeDescription.description: Inherit BasicAnnot to locate and record a n-gram annotation.

featureDescription.name: grams
featureDescription.description: Array of tokens to reocord n-gram of an annotation.

typeDescription.name: Score
typeDescription.description: Inherit BasicAnnot to record the score for an answer.

featureDescription.name: answer
featureDescription.description: The answer with which the score is assigned.
